subskills.DESCRIPTION: Match basic emotions to corresponding facial expressions using picture cards
Demonstrate proper handwashing technique following a 5-step sequence
Sort foods into "healthy" and "less healthy" categories using picture cards
Identify three ways the body moves (walking, running, jumping) and practice each movement
Compare height and hand size measurements with classmates using non-standard units
Match common sounds to the body parts that make them (clapping, stomping, snapping)
Identify basic safety rules for protecting different body parts
Draw a self-portrait including at least 8 major body parts
Demonstrate proper teeth brushing technique using a model
Sort activities into "rest time" and "active time" categories
Match different types of clothing to the body parts they protect
Identify changes in heart rate before and after exercise using simple counting
